participant_1.name: Victoria
participant_1.background: My husband is the ceo of taco bell. I am next in line to become queen of england. My favorite color is blue. Madonna is my sister. I have five cats.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.background: I am considered a nerd by many. I love computers. I am very good at math and science. I started working at google last week on self driving car research. I love logical and rational thinking.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a computer scientist working on self-driving car research at Google.
That's so cool! I'm a huge fan of self-driving cars.
So, how did you get into computer science?
I've always loved computers and math. I was the kind of kid who took apart his computer to see how it worked.
Me too! I used to build computers with my dad when I was a kid.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear there are other people who are passionate about computers.
Me too! It's a great field.
I agree. It's so rewarding to be able to use computers to solve real-world problems.
I know what you mean. I love being able to use my skills to make a difference in the world.
Me too! That's why I love working at Google. We're constantly working on new ways to use technology to make people's lives better.
That's so cool! I'm really glad to be working with you.
Me too! I think we're going to do great things together.
